products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: Make every moment epic with Galaxy S21 5G’s next generation smartphone camera & video. Create high-res stills with 8K Video Snap & get share-ready shots first time, every time with Single Take. Galaxy S21 5G mobile phone is unashamedly different with sleek, contour-cut metal housing & stylish smartphone colours. It’s the ultimate combination of smart mobile phone tech & stylish looks. Boasting a sleek new smartphone shape & stylish mobile phone shades, Galaxy S21 5G sim free android smartphone is the ultimate in self-expression. The smartphones contour-cut metal camera fuses beautifully with the mobile device, & Samsung’s new frosted haze effect & metal frame look feel amazing, making smudges & smartphone fingerprints a thing of the past. Android phone featuring the toughest Gorilla Glass Victus, Glastic Rear & an AL7s10 Metal Frame for protection & peace of mind, Galaxy S21 5G mobile phone is designed to look pristine.

products.name: Doogee Icore
products.description: Strong 5G signal, powerful Global frequency band, bigger battery, faster charging speed, bigger screen, faster response speed on screen, excellent value for money.

products.name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 8 Pro
products.description: Xiaomi Redmi Note 8 Pro is powered by the Mediatek Helio G90T, Octa-core (2x Cortex-A76 + 6x Cortex-A55) processor. The smartphone comes with a 6.53 inches IPS LCD and 1080 x 2340 pixels resolution. The screen of the device is protected by Corning Gorilla Glass 5. The rear camera consists of a 64 MP (wide) + 8 MP (ultrawide) + 2 MP (dedicated macro camera) + 2 MP depth sensor lenses.

products.name: Iphone XS
products.description: iPhone XS Max, the 6.5-inch iPhone, is the largest display Apple has offered, but in a body that's the size of the iPhone 8 Plus. According to Apple, the iPhone XS and XS Max have the most durable glass ever in a smartphone with improved scratch resistance.

products.name: Nokia 5230
products.description: The Nokia 5230 (also known as the Nokia 5230 Nuron) is a smartphone manufactured by Nokia, running Symbian OS v9.4, S60 5th Edition. It was released in November 2009 after being announced in August of the same year.

products.name: Huawei P40
products.description: Huawei P40 is a line of high-end Android-based smartphones manufactured by Huawei. Unveiled on 26 March 2020, they succeed the Huawei P30 in the company's P series line.

products.name: Iphone 13
products.description: The iPhone 13 and iPhone 13 Mini (stylized as iPhone 13 mini) are smartphones designed, developed, marketed, and sold by Apple Inc. They are the fifteenth generation of iPhones (succeeding the iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Mini respectively).

products.name: Samsung M32
products.description: The Galaxy M32 has a smooth, yet patterned surface with slight lines that catch the prism light beautifully at various angles. With a choice of black, white or blue, the design is balanced and sturdy.
